MorphoRegions 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Package index

Functions

Functions for preparing the data, fitting regressions, selecting best models, and plotting results

PCOload() plot(<regions_pco_load>)
Calculate PCO loadings
PCOselect() plot(<regions_pco_select>) summary(<regions_pco_select>)
Select PCO scores
calcBPvar()
Calculate variability of breakpoints
calcmodel()
Calculate results of a single segmented regression model
calcregions() addregions() summary(<regions_results>) ncombos()
Fit segmented regression models for all combinations of breakpoints
modelperf()
Assess model performance
modelselect()
Select the best models
modelsupport()
Evaluate model support
plot(<regions_pco>)
Plot PCO axes
plotsegreg()
Plot a segmented regression model
plotvertmap()
Plot a vertebra map
simregions() plot(<regions_sim>)
Simulate regions data
process_measurements()
Process vertebra measurements
subsample()
Subsample a dataset
svdPCO()
Calculate PCO (principal co-ordinates analysis) based on SVD

Datasets

alligator
Measurements from the vertebral column of Alligator
dolphin
Measurements from the vertebral column of Dolphin
musm
Measurements from the vertebral column of Mus
porpoise
Measurements from the vertebral column of three porpoises
